name: Mister Mart
description: Punch Customers! Return Items! Get High Scores! Enter the world of Mister Mart, and enjoy this cathartic experience of working customer service with no worry about getting fired.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 410 MB available space
